data.flavor_text: "Your ideas will be discarded and your will repurposed."

data.name: Gainsay
data.oracle_text: Counter target blue spell.
data.flavor_text:
"You dryfolk must take the air for granted. You constantly insist on wasting it."
—Kenessos, priest of Thassa

data.name: Gainsay
data.oracle_text: Counter target blue spell.

"I'd be happy to stop contradicting you, Urza, just as soon as you start being right."
—Bo Levar, planeswalker

data.name: Gale's Redirection
data.oracle_text:
Exile target spell, then roll a d20 and add that spell's mana value.
1—14 | You may cast the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.
15+ | You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

data.name: Geistlight Snare
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Spirit. It also costs {1} less to cast if you control an enchantment.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
data.flavor_text: Tamil had always wanted a closer look at a geist's lantern. Now he had an eternity to study one.

data.name: Geist Snatch
data.oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Create a 1/1 blue Spirit creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text: Angels and demons aren't the only ones listening to your prayers.

data.name: Glorious End
data.oracle_text:
End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)
At the beginning of your next end step, you lose the game.

data.name: Grip of Amnesia

"Would you abandon your past to save your future?"
—Ambassador Laquatus

data.oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.

data.name: Oppressive Will

data.flavor_text: When Minamo was abandoned, its younger students found themselves thrust into a war beyond their skill with talents beyond their control.

data.name: Out of Bounds
data.oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)
Counter target spell.
data.flavor_text: The wardens watch for illegal tactics and protect spectators from the occasional rogue fireball.

data.name: Outwit
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell that targets a player.
data.flavor_text: The student asks how a spell is begun. The master ponders what ends it.

data.name: Override
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each artifact you control.
data.flavor_text: "The Knowledge Pool has all the answers—especially 'No.'"

data.name: Overrule
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. You gain X life.
data.flavor_text: With one commanding word, the spell was put down and a fine collected for its casting.

data.name: Overwhelming Denial
data.oracle_text:
Surge {U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its surge cost if you or a teammate has cast another spell this turn.)
This spell can't be countered.
Counter target spell.

data.name: Overwhelming Intellect
data.oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Draw cards equal to that spell's mana value.
data.flavor_text: "My brain hurts."

data.name: Pact of Negation
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.
data.flavor_text: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.

data.name: Pact of Negation
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.

data.name: Perplex
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller discards their hand.
Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

data.name: Plasm Capture
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next precombat main phase, add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is that spell's mana value.
data.flavor_text:
"Everything serves a purpose. Even you."
—Vorel of the Hull Clade

data.name: Prohibit
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Counter target spell if its mana value is 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, counter that spell if its mana value is 4 or less instead.

data.name: Psychic Barrier
data.oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Its controller loses 1 life.
data.flavor_text:
"I tolerate Phyrexians because the dragon requires it. But I have no patience for uninvited guests."
—Tezzeret

data.name: Psychic Rebuttal
data.oracle_text:
Counter target instant or sorcery spell that targets you.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may copy the spell countered this way. You may choose new targets for the copy.
data.flavor_text: "I know what you're thinking," Jace whispered in the mage's mind. "It's not going to work."

data.name: Psychic Strike
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Its controller mills two cards.
data.flavor_text: Until more information could be gleaned about Niv-Mizzet's intentions, Lazav took every opportunity to stall his experiments.

data.name: Psychic Trance
data.oracle_text: Until end of turn, Wizards you control gain "{T}: Counter target spell."
data.flavor_text: The Riptide Project was perhaps the only school devoted to preventing the spread of knowledge.

data.name: Punish Ignorance
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text:
"Amateurish. Nearsighted. A waste of my time and everyone else's."
—Indra, nullmage of Vectis

data.name: Put Away
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. You may shuffle up to one target card from your graveyard into your library.
data.flavor_text: Kithkin spellbottlers spend half their time preserving old memories and the other half punishing the new.

data.name: Pyroblast
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's blue.
• Destroy target permanent if it's blue.
data.flavor_text: Water can be crushing, but it is predictable. Fire is always dynamic, its rage absolute and all-consuming.

data.oracle_text:

• Counter target spell if it's blue.

"Just the thing for those pesky water mages."
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

data.name: Quandrix Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Return target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand.
• Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

• Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library.

data.name: Quash
data.oracle_text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

data.name: Quench
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
data.flavor_text: "When properly invoked, the plasma globule encloses the offensive spell with a satisfying slurp."

data.name: Rakshasa's Disdain
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.
data.flavor_text: "Every failure, every death only makes my strength greater."

—Tavalus, priest of Korlis

"With just a little added flair, your work could be truly spectacular. Let me show you."
—Nassari, Prismari dean

data.name: Reject

data.flavor_text:
"Grux, for the last time, you have to do more than simply shout 'Apply!' at the administrators."
—Pavil, admissions officer

data.name: Rethink

data.flavor_text: "Are you *sure* you want to do that?"

data.name: Revolutionary Rebuff
data.oracle_text: Counter target nonartifact spell unless its controller pays {2}.
data.flavor_text: By the time a Consulate sanction becomes official, the renegade quicksmiths have already found a way to circumvent it.

data.name: Rewind
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
data.flavor_text:
"Time flows like a river. In Tolaria we practice the art of building dams."
—Barrin, master wizard

data.name: Rites of Refusal
data.oracle_text: Discard any number of cards. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3} for each card discarded this way.

data.name: Runeboggle
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Ever try to count hyperactive schoolchildren while someone shouts random numbers in your ear? It's like that."
—Geetra, frustrated mage

data.name: Rune Snag
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} plus an additional {2} for each card named Rune Snag in each graveyard.
data.flavor_text:
"Concentration is key. Without it, a mage conjures nothing but a splitting headache."
—Zur the Enchanter
